ygData.subject: when GMs go bad..
ygData.msgSnippet: having played on MUDs for some years, i know one thing: if a wiz wants to toy with you, let em, so long as its in good spirit. imho if you cant stand a little
ygData.messageBody:
having played on MUDs for some years, i know one thing: if a wiz wants to
toy with you, let em, so long as its in good spirit. imho if you cant stand
a little friendly abuse from player gods, yer playing the wrong game..
HOWEVER, in your situation, i can't say if he was just shoving you around or
being genuinely juvenile. what is the name you used for your character? what
is the name you had him change it to at first? what are the EXACT words you
used to talk to him? i tend to give GMs the benefit of the doubt (since
there are relatively few of them compared to the large numbers of genuine
nutcases online) so i dont want to try to judge anybody unless i know more
info.. but since you know what happened, if you really think this guy was
abusing his GM powers, send an email to verant detailing the situation and
the name of the GM. since everquest is corporate run, not privately
administrated like most MUDs, i dunno exactly what kind of response you'd
get.. hopefully something that helps you out tho.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
